issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
1. use the noted CI build
2. install a simple project to device or sim

fails with errors:

[ERROR] Error: Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/1.7.0/iphone/builder.py", line 1306, in main
    execute_xcode("iphoneos%s" % iphone_version,args,False)
  File "/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/1.7.0/iphone/builder.py", line 1066, in execute_xcode
    output = run.run(args,False,False,o)
  File "/Library/Application Support/Titanium/mobilesdk/osx/1.7.0/iphone/run.py", line 39, in run
    sys.exit(rc)
SystemExit: 65

NOtes: creating a new project works fine, seems to be about KS. injected since the pass last week
fields.summary: iOS - Install KS to device and emulator fails with errors
fields.environment: OsX10.6.7, used CI build Apr 26 2011 04:12 r00716701 and 1.7.0 (04/25/11 10:34 c8cb7c3...). am able to publish using 1.6.2 with no issues.

comments.body: JIRA, Y U NO UPDATE STATUS? Oh. Because it's not resolved, it's fixed. My bad.
